persons.name: Catherine MariaFanshawe
persons.description: English poet, author and artist who copied poems into Davy's notebook under the pseudonym 'Fidelissima'.

places.name: Ontario
places.description: Ontario is a province in east-central Canada.

persons.name: AnnaBeddoes
persons.description: Anna Beddoes, n√©e Edgeworth, the wife of Thomas Beddoes who befriended Davy when he arrived in Bristol. Critics have speculated that they had an affair because Davy wrote poems to Anna and she wrote poems for him that he copied out in his notebooks.

persons.name: Homer
persons.description: Homer was a Greek poet who is believed to have written the epic poems, the Iliad and the Odyssey.

works.name: The hoary priest even / at the altar shot' is a line from Sir Walter Scott's poem The Vision of Don Roderick. Scott reviewed Davy's Salmonia in the Quarterly Review. He was a friend of Davy.
works.author: Sir Walter Scott

persons.name: WilliamWynne
persons.description: Lawyer, Dean of the Arches and later Master of Trinity Hall, Cambridge. Knighted 1788. FRSL.

places.name: Andes
places.description: Mountain range in western South America.
